skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I'm a frontend developer with a strong proficiency in building dynamic and user-friendly web applications. I specialize in crafting elegant and responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Additionally, I have a deep understanding of React, a popular JavaScript library, which allows me to create interactive and feature-rich single-page applications (SPAs) that provide seamless user experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I'm a backend developer with expertise in building robust and efficient server-side applications using Node.js and Express. My skills include designing scalable APIs, optimizing database queries, and implementing secure authentication and authorization systems. I'm passionate about creating high-performance server solutions that power modern web and mobile applications.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: As a UI/UX designer, I bring a creative and user-centric approach to crafting exceptional digital experiences. With a keen eye for design aesthetics and a deep understanding of user behavior, I specialize in creating intuitive and visually appealing interfaces. I'm proficient in Figma, a versatile design tool, which enables me to prototype, iterate, and collaborate seamlessly. My goal is to design user interfaces that not only look stunning but also enhance usability and user satisfaction.

skills.title: Blockchain Development
skills.description: I also possess strong proficiency in blockchain development, with a focus on creating small and medium-sized blockchain applications. My skills include designing and implementing smart contracts, developing decentralized applications (DApps), and working with blockchain technologies like Ethereum, Metamask and Solidity. I'm passionate about harnessing the potential of blockchain to create secure and transparent solutions for various industries.
